creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Following components need updating:
- Http Request
- Http Test Script Recorder
- AccessLogSampler GUI
- Module Controller GUI
- Record Controller GUI
- Tree View Listener
- JSON-PATH Extractor and JSON-PATH Renderer in View Results Tree
- CookieManager
- CompareAssertion
- Regular Expression Extractor
- JMeter Dashboard/Report : Host a sample report ?
- ThreadGroup
- Main GUI (test start time)
- JSR223 Test Element (removed cache key)

URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1738970&view=rev
